name: Wake UP! (cmtrain)
description:
Use the Arrow Keys to Move. Use the the Up arrow to both jump and enter doors. 

Your are stuck in a dream that is slowly turning into a nightmare. Each door you enter brings you closer to waking up but also closer to your nightmare.

This is my first game jam and if you are interested he is the link to my dev log .

https://itch.io/jam/my-first-game-jam-summer-2017/topic/127851/wake-up-
